name: Omega Virus (Mr.Meik)
description:
A rogue AI has taken over the space station and the security systems. Use your gun and blast your way through the defenses. There are upgrades throughout the station that should help you along the way!

Version 1.1 Changelog:

  • Added music and new sounds
  • Rebalanced shielding / parrying
  • Added a new checkpoint
  • Tweaked game balance
